ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: no lev 2 rez is supposed to give you i think at least half of what you got back....lv 3 is supposed to give you almost all of what you lost back
ygData.messageBody:
no lev 2 rez is supposed to give you i think at least half of what you got
back....lv 3 is supposed to give you almost all of what you lost back

Azor wrote:

> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
> Well congrats on Lvl 39, as for Rez I have no idea cause I'm only on Lvl 15
> almost 16. But maybe cause you just got it and it doesn't do as good when
> you first get it? That might be it or just a bug or it did give those few
> ppl exp back, I don't think it gives ya a good bit back just a little bit
> and maybe they just couldn't tell.
>
> **************************
> Azor
> Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> > ok...upon making 39 <yay (:> i rezzed a couple ppl with
> > resusitate....but they say that exp didn't move...i rezzed one person
> > once, and another twice, one for each corpse.....the 2nd person said he
> > seen exp regained from the 2nd one, but not from the 1st, even tho he
> > got the mssg "you have gained some exp back from the
> > ressurection.."...just wondering, is it a bug or does it always do that?
> > any help would be appreciated....just confusing is all
> >
